title: Predicting Division Winners, Wild-Card Teams, and a Super Bowl Champion
description:
Kevin and Nora are joined by Benjamin Solak to predict division winners, wild-card teams, and a Super Bowl champion.

Hosts: Kevin Clark and Nora Princiotti
Guest: Benjamin Solak
Production assistant: Isaiah Blakely
Additional production supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
